inclusion.criterion: men and women of any ethnic origin aged ≥18 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: V max across the aortic valve > 4m/s or Pmean ≥ 40mmHg and AVA ≤ 1cm2 or AVAi ≤ 0.6cm2/m2 at rest
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Participation in another clinical trial within 30 days prior randomization
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 48 M with a h/o HTN hyperlipidemia, bicuspid aortic valve, and tobacco abuse who presented to his cardiologist on [**2148-10-1**] with progressive SOB and LE edema. TTE revealed severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function. EF was 25%. RV pressure was 41 and had biatrial enlargement. Noted to have 2+ aortic insufficiency with mild MR.
